author: lihux25
body: Now pack the correct headers for the QIE10 and QIE11 so that the unpack knows how to do with them. Also skip the QIE11DataFrame::FLAG_WORDS number of words similar to the QIE10 case. Testing shows the code works well for the 2017 scenario with a mixture of QIE8, QIE10 and QIE11 simDigi collections.
title: Fix some bugs related to QIE10 and QIE11 packing
